body:
Comment 1: 
The Constants section only shows untyped constants. Typed constant
blocks appear under the type, as you have found, so that when you look
at the Duration docs you find the constants. This is something you
have to learn when reading the Go docs, but now you know.

The same is true for top-level functions that are constructors. They
appear between the type they construct and the methods on that type,
not listed with other top-level functions.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
